subject: Steroids
Horse Racing
organizations: American Graded Stakes Committee of the Thoroughbred Owners and Breeders Association
lead_paragraph: States that fail to adopt a steroid ban in horse racing by the end of the year could lose their graded stakes status in 2009. The American Graded Stakes Committee of the Thoroughbred Owners and Breeders Association passed a requirement this week that would penalize states if they do not adopt a proposed model rule steroid ban by Jan. 1. At least 10 states have approved the ban.
